author: Vasilios Stefanis

changelog.release_notes: In the latest update I have made the watchface configurable with up to 7 colors to chose from (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, and pink) as well as long needed date customization (ddmm vs mmdd) enjoy and let me know what improvements youd like to see! caution: face will crash if settings are changed too quickly/often. will simply need a restart of the face.

description:
UPDATE: In the latest update I have made the watchface configurable with up to 7 colors to chose from (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, and pink) as well as long needed date customization (ddmm vs mmdd) enjoy and let me know what improvements youd like to see! caution: face will crash if settings are changed too quickly/often. will simply need a restart of the face.



This is a watchface designed with the numbers from Steins;gate's divergence meter and old fashioned nixie tubes. It currently only supports pebble time's colored display, but will produce a black and white version if there is enough interest.

latest_release.release_notes: In the latest update I have made the watchface configurable with up to 7 colors to chose from (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, purple, and pink) as well as long needed date customization (ddmm vs mmdd) enjoy and let me know what improvements youd like to see! caution: face will crash if settings are changed too quickly/often. will simply need a restart of the face.

title: Steins;Gate Meter
